revised_title: Determination of Verdet's Constant in Absolute Units
tldr: The authors investigate the rotation of the plane of polarization in passing through magnetic media, specifically focusing on Verdet's constant. They measure this constant in absolute units using distilled water and an electric current in a helix to generate magnetic force. The result obtained is a value of 0.0001 centimeter-gramme-seconds, with dimensions being the reciprocal of current.
